mapper.insert: insert into refund_tax(PROJECT_ID, BRAND_ATTRIBUTE, DEMAND_NAME, SUPPLIER, RECEIPT_NAME, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_TIME, TAX_RATE, THEORY_REFUND_TAX, CAN_REFUND_TAX, ACTUAL_REFUND_TAX, STATE) values (#{projectId}, #{brandAttribute}, #{demandName}, #{supplier}, #{receiptName}, #{invoiceAmount}, #{invoiceTime}, #{taxRate}, #{theoryRefundTax}, #{canRefundTax}, #{actualRefundTax}, #{state})

update.foreach: UPDATE refund_tax SET ACTUAL_REFUND_TAX = #{item.actualRefundTax} WHERE ID = #{item.id}
